---
title: "Analyze Data"
---

## important packages

When analysing data from a hub, you will want the following packages:

 - [hubData](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubData) seamlessly access data from a local or remote hub
 - [hubEnsembles](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubEnsembles) combine models into an ensemble using built-in or custom methods
 - [hubVis](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubVis) visualize model output
 - [hubEvals](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubEvals) compare and evaluate models in an established hub
